bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Unable to uncheck execution by clicking checkbox
bug.description: There is an additional call which is disabling the default behavior on click (added in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/commit/1a52cec99f12a25b825145918e9f2b65c547003f>1a52cec</denchmark-link> ).
